resources.string: If you do not login with gmail, you will not be able to use certain features in Google Drive \nwhile uploading assignments and study materials. \nWe strongly recommend you to use Gmail
There are no students\nin your batch
Make your contact number visible to all?
You will not be able to use Google Drive in notice, assignments and study materials if you do not use Google account
Trust us its way more fun & productive with your fellow batchmates
Note: Your headline is a short and crisp introduction for your connections. Below is an example:
Note: Having a profile picture helps your connections to notice you !!

3.8 billion people in the world use social media in their everyday lives. With more and more users joining every day, the purpose of networking is being lost.To help students leverage their coaching days to its full potential, the need of the hour is a student-centric all-in-one platform; which would not only enable them to help to organize their messed up lives, give them goals to achieve and ease the access to study materials.

Atheta is an attempt to completely transform the lives of students - a one of a kind Virtual Coaching environment only for our students!\nOur goal on a wider scale is to empower the students of our world with AI-powered technology, to learn from each other and strive forward in their life; organized and prepared.\n Atheta aims to help the students to express themselves, help the community and innovate.

Our application is designed to simplify the unorganized life of a student by providing a platform

 • to have fun in a private social networking domain ONLY for the students of that batch (no outsiders!).
 • to easily store NOTES / QUESTIONS BANKS / PLACEMENT REPORTS etc. for each and every batch of the tuition.
 • to get important NOTICES with their respective deadlines.
 • to remain updated with EVENTS / TESTS / WORKSHOPS happening all over the batch.
 • to COMMUNICATE with anyone and everyone from their tuition batch.

We support networking and communication, thus the \'GLOBAL FEED\' is provided where all batches are present to increase networking, share tips, advice, experiences and update students about competitions, internship opportunities, test news, online courses and a lot more!! Make friends, expand your reach and collaborate!

We allow you to remain connected to your batch even at this time so that you do not miss events and news, also helping the students to easily access their alumni database.\nA single application to remain Updated, Organized and Connected to your Tuition!\nAnd of course, to learn;)

Students can find teachers as per their needs\n\nTeachers can explore & apply for suitable jobs
Build connections, share ideas, attend events & explore your interests
Manage and Connect with your batch
Teachers & Students get features like Attendance, Tests, Chat & Notice Board at one place with Atheta.
